forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 3 to 14 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight settles over Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a comforting crispness, hinting at the chill that will embrace the evening. The skies above are predominantly clear, allowing for an unobstructed view of the city’s orange and purple hues melting into one another. A gentle breeze brushes against your skin, whispering promises of a mild night, with temperatures expected to dip to a fresh 52 degrees. The westward winds, playful yet steady, add a touch of vitality to the atmosphere, as they shift between 6 to 10 mph, occasionally gusting to 26 mph, reminding us of the San Francisco spirit.

Tomorrow unfurls with the anticipation of a sunny day, where the warmth of the sun will hover around 66 degrees, slowly easing into a cooler afternoon. The landscape will be welcoming, devoid of fog, making it an ideal time to don layers—not too heavy, but enough to keep the chill at bay, perhaps a light sweater or a tailored jacket to embrace the breeziness. A day like this beckons leisurely strolls along the waterfront, invigorating bike rides through Golden Gate Park, or finding a cozy spot in one of the city’s many cafes to watch the world mingle outside. So, for this evening, wrap yourself in something comfortable, step onto the streets, and savor the delightful simplicity of a San Francisco night.
